verses.verse: In that <WH1931> day <WH3117> there shall be <WH1961> a fountain <WH4726> opened <WH6605> to the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> and to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> for sin <WH2403> and for uncleanness. <WH5079>

And it shall come to pass <WH1961> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> that I will cut off <WH3772> <WH853> the names <WH8034> of the idols <WH6091> out of <WH4480> the land, <WH776> and they shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> be remembered: <WH2142> and also <WH1571> I will cause <WH853> the prophets <WH5030> and the unclean <WH2932> spirit <WH7307> to pass <WH5674> out of <WH4480> the land. <WH776>

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that when <WH3588> any <WH376> shall yet <WH5750> prophesy, <WH5012> then his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517> that begot <WH3205> him shall say <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Thou shalt not <WH3808> live; <WH2421> for <WH3588> thou speakest <WH1696> lies <WH8267> in the name <WH8034> of the LORD: <WH3068> and his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517> that begot <WH3205> him shall thrust him through <WH1856> when he prophesieth. <WH5012>

And it shall come to pass <WH1961> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> that the prophets <WH5030> shall be ashamed <WH954> every one <WH376> of his vision, <WH4480> <WH2384> when he hath prophesied; <WH5012> neither <WH3808> shall they wear <WH3847> a rough <WH8181> garment <WH155> to <WH4616> deceive: <WH3584>

But he shall say, <WH559> I <WH595> am no <WH3808> prophet, <WH5030> I <WH595> am a husbandman; <WH376> <WH5647> <WH127> for <WH3588> man <WH120> taught me to keep cattle <WH7069> from my youth. <WH4480> <WH5271>

And one shall say <WH559> unto <WH413> him, What <WH4100> are these <WH428> wounds <WH4347> in <WH996> thine hands? <WH3027> Then he shall answer, <WH559> Those with which <WH834> I was wounded <WH5221> in the house <WH1004> of my friends. <WH157>

Awake, <WH5782> O sword, <WH2719> against <WH5921> my shepherd, <WH7462> and against <WH5921> the man <WH1397> that is my fellow, <WH5997> saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts: <WH6635> smite <WH5221> <WH853> the shepherd, <WH7462> and the sheep <WH6629> shall be scattered: <WH6327> and I will turn <WH7725> mine hand <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the little ones. <WH6819>

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that in all <WH3605> the land, <WH776> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> two <WH8147> parts <WH6310> therein shall be cut off <WH3772> and die; <WH1478> but the third <WH7992> shall be left <WH3498> therein.

And I will bring <WH935> <WH853> the third part <WH7992> through the fire, <WH784> and will refine <WH6884> them as <WH853> silver <WH3701> is refined, <WH6884> and will try <WH974> them as <WH853> gold <WH2091> is tried: <WH974> they <WH1931> shall call <WH7121> on my name, <WH8034> and I <WH589> will hear <WH6030> them: I will say, <WH559> It <WH1931> is my people: <WH5971> and they <WH1931> shall say, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> is my God. <WH430>
